snippet: Before Jose Pimentel’s arrest, according to the documents, an F.B.I. agent who investigates domestic terrorism cases sought a search warrant for Mr. Pimentel’s e-mail accounts.
abstract: Court papers suggest a larger degree of involvement by the federal government in the early stages of the investigation into Jose Pimentel, accused of building a pipe bomb with a confidential informant in New York City, than was previously known; before his arrest, for instance, an FBI agent who investigates domestic terrorism cases sought a search warrant for Pimentel’s e-mail accounts.
lead_paragraph: Before Jose Pimentel’s arrest, according to the documents, an F.B.I. agent who investigates domestic terrorism cases sought a search warrant for Mr. Pimentel’s e-mail accounts.

headline.seo: F.B.I. Had Greater Role in Jose Pimentel Terrorism Case, Documents Show
headline.main: Documents Show Extent of F.B.I.’s Role in Terror Case
headline.print_headline: Documents Show Extent of F.B.I.’s Role in Terror Case
